name: Introduction to Linguistics
description: This course introduces the fundamentals of linguistics, including the study of language structure and its social context.

name: Syntax I
description: This course covers the basics of syntax, including the structure of sentences, phrase structure rules, and transformational rules.

name: Phonology I
description: This course covers the basics of phonology, including the organization of sounds in a language, phonemic inventories, and phonological rules.

name: Semantics I
description: This course covers the basics of semantics, including the study of meaning, the structure of meaning, and the relation between language and thought.

name: Syntax II
description: This course covers more advanced topics in syntax, including Chomsky's transformational grammar and generative semantics.

name: Phonology II
description: This course covers more advanced topics in phonology, including features, constraints, and optimality theory.

name: Semantics II
description: This course covers more advanced topics in semantics, including meaning representation, discourse analysis, and natural language processing.
